SELECT b.bno, b.resno, c.content as item, m.mid, b.reg_date, b.update_date, b.bview_count, b.btitle, b.bcontents, b.bseq, b.pno, b.bgroup, b.pno, b.board_type_mcd, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD b WHERE b.bgroup = #{bno}) as re_count FROM BOARD b JOIN COMMON C ON b.board_type_bcd = c.bcd AND b.board_type_mcd = c.mcd JOIN MEMBER m ON b.memno = m.memno WHERE b.bno = #{bno}

SELECT b.bno, b.resno, NVL(c.content, '') as item, m.mid, b.reg_date, b.update_date, b.bview_count, b.btitle, b.bcontents, b.bseq, b.bstatus_mcd, b.bgroup, b.pno, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD b WHERE b.bgroup = #{bno}) as re_count FROM BOARD b LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMON C ON b.board_type_bcd = c.bcd AND b.board_type_mcd = c.mcd JOIN MEMBER m ON b.memno = m.memno WHERE b.bgroup = #{bno}
SELECT * FROM orderproduct op JOIN product pd ON op.pno = pd.pno WHERE op.orderno = #{orderno} AND op.pno = #{pno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(bno, btitle, bcontents, reg_date, board_type_bcd, board_type_mcd, orderno, pno, bimg,memno) VALUES (seq_board.nextval, #{btitle}, #{bcontents}, sysdate, 350, 300, #{orderno}, #{pno}, #{bimg}, #{memno})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM board WHERE orderno = #{orderno} AND pno = #{pno}
